profile.name: Ajay Darisi
profile.objective: Seeking a Software Developer position to leverage my 3 years of experience in web development and team management to build innovative and efficient applications.

experience.description: Led a 15-member team to build and scale a global back-office app used by 15,000+ teachers and admins across 60+ countries.
achievements: Focused on architecture, feature delivery, and performance optimization using Next.js (Refine), Shadcn UI, Zustand, NestJS, message queues, and microservices.
Developed configurable course registration pages enabling dynamic content and flow customization, supporting 100,000+ participant registrations.
Built a reusable payment gateway integration module used by multiple Art of Living projects.
Built an internal translation management system using Supabase and JS for 60+ countries and 50+ languages, reducing localization turnaround time.
Built a unified fundraising wrapper that dynamically integrates multiple campaigns using configurable data.
Collaborated in the rapid development of the Art of Living US website, delivering optimized Next.js components within 48 hours.

experience.description: Worked on the front-end of the Art of Living Latin America Backoffice application.
achievements: Translated 600+ Figma screens into production using ReactJS.
Developed 15+ custom UI components that improved usability and ensured consistent UI/UX for over 5,000 active admin users.

projects.title: Snapshots App
projects.description: Built a responsive app for securely uploading, previewing, storing, and managing photos using Firebase Storage, Realtime Database, and Authentication. Implemented smooth CRUD operations and optimized image handling for an improved user experience.

projects.title: Translation System
projects.description: Enterprise translation management system supporting 50+ languages for global content.

projects.title: Payment Wrapper
projects.description: Unified payment gateway wrapper simplifying integration for multiple providers.

projects.title: Fundraising Platform
projects.description: SaaS platform for managing fundraising campaigns and donor relationships.
